state: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! Here is how to play! First step, venture north. And then, take a trip east. Then, move east. After that, make an effort to take a trip south. Okay, and then, take a trip west. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. And then, make an effort to head south. With that done, make an attempt to go to the south. If you can succeed at that, attempt to head south. With that done, make an attempt to venture west. After that, move south. Okay, and then, travel east. Then, travel south. And then, move east. With that done, lift the coin from the floor of the kitchenette. And once you've done that, you win! -= Launderette =- You are in a launderette. A normal one. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Launderette =-0/1
